traits.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of her turns in combat, Nine-Fingers can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Dagger Thrower
entries: Nine-Fingers adds double her proficiency bonus to the damage she deals on ranged attacks made with daggers (already factored into her attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Nine-Fingers attacks three times with her daggers.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage, plus 6 piercing damage if it's a ranged attack.
